title: Authority

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may Command a player. If they would visit a player, they secretly visit themself instead. You learn their night feedback if you successfully force them to visit themselves. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, all players who attempt to visit you are instead secretly redirected to visit themself. You learn exactly who tries to visit you and their corresponding night feedback.
Kill Note Addition:
*"Your fate was decided the moment I laid eyes on you. Do not be so foolish as to deny me."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4919
*Assert yourself. Look at them from above.*
